export var questionObj = {
  "Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ (p - 2q - 3r + 4s )(p + 2q + 3r + 4s ) = \\
	(p + 2q - 3r - 4s )(p - 2 q + 3r - 4s )
\end{multline}
Show that
\[
	2ps = 3 qr 
\]
\newline

",
  "Steps": [{
    "id": "s1",
    "n_params": 0,
    "step_txt": "It is given that 
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ (p - 2q - 3r + 4s )(p + 2q + 3r + 4s ) = \\
	(p + 2q - 3r - 4s )(p - 2 q + 3r - 4s )
\end{multline}

\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p + 2q + 3r + 4s }{p + 2q - 3r - 4s } = \frac{p - 2 q + 3r - 4s }{p - 2q - 3r + 4s }
\]
Now, by using componendo and dividendo, we can write the above expression as
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{(p + 2q + 3r + 4s ) + (p + 2q - 3r - 4s )}{(p + 2q + 3r + 4s ) - (p + 2q - 3r - 4s )} = \\
	\frac{(p - 2 q + 3r - 4s ) + (p - 2q - 3r + 4s )}{(p - 2 q + 3r - 4s ) - (p - 2q - 3r + 4s )}
\end{multline}
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2 p + 4 q }{6 r + 8 s } = \frac{2p - 4q }{6 r - 8 s }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p + 2q }{3 r + 4 s } = \frac{p - 2q }{3r - 4s }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p + 2q }{p - 2q } = \frac{3r + 4s }{3r - 4s }
\]
Now, by using componendo and didivendo, we get
\[
	\frac{p }{2q } = \frac{3r }{4s }
\]
Now, we got
\[
	\Rightarrow 4ps = 6qr 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 2ps = 3qr 
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"
  }]
};
export var resp = [{
  "data": [],
  "text": " "
}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ (p - 2q - 3r + 4s )(p + 2q + 3r + 4s ) = \\
	(p + 2q - 3r - 4s )(p - 2 q + 3r - 4s )
\end{multline}
Show that
\[
	2ps = 3 qr 
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ (p - 2q - 3r + 4s )(p + 2q + 3r + 4s ) = \\
	(p + 2q - 3r - 4s )(p - 2 q + 3r - 4s )
\end{multline}

\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p + 2q + 3r + 4s }{p + 2q - 3r - 4s } = \frac{p - 2 q + 3r - 4s }{p - 2q - 3r + 4s }
\]
Now, by using componendo and dividendo, we can write the above expression as
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{(p + 2q + 3r + 4s ) + (p + 2q - 3r - 4s )}{(p + 2q + 3r + 4s ) - (p + 2q - 3r - 4s )} = \\
	\frac{(p - 2 q + 3r - 4s ) + (p - 2q - 3r + 4s )}{(p - 2 q + 3r - 4s ) - (p - 2q - 3r + 4s )}
\end{multline}
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2 p + 4 q }{6 r + 8 s } = \frac{2p - 4q }{6 r - 8 s }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p + 2q }{3 r + 4 s } = \frac{p - 2q }{3r - 4s }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p + 2q }{p - 2q } = \frac{3r + 4s }{3r - 4s }
\]
Now, by using componendo and didivendo, we get
\[
	\frac{p }{2q } = \frac{3r }{4s }
\]
Now, we got
\[
	\Rightarrow 4ps = 6qr 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 2ps = 3qr 
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
